channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins FindBugs Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins FindBugs Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2317|2024-08-04T07:09:54.233Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20findbugs%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins FindBugs Plugin 5.0.0 and earlier does not escape the annotation message in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to provide report files to Jenkins FindBugs Plugin's post build step.
